description: The 'Meet' event refers to an instance where two or more entities come together for a discussion, negotiation, or any form of interaction. The event can be triggered by words such as 'meet', 'talks', 'conference', 'forum', 'negotiations', 'meeting', 'brief', 'discussed', etc. The event can occur in various contexts such as political meetings, business conferences, casual gatherings, etc. Edge cases include virtual meetings or informal gatherings which should also be considered.

It encompasses both formal and informal meetings, including virtual ones. Annotators should be aware of the context to correctly identify the event.
